Package Part2

Class CargoshipInventory1

Object
CargoshipInventory1
public class CargoshipInventory1
extends Object
CargoshipInventory1 class which contains the main method and its supporting static methods that reads from a text file, corrects the wrong serial numbers from it, and write them into a new user created file.
Author:
Matthew Pan

    • cargosCount

      private static int cargosCount​(String initialCargo) throws FileNotFoundException
      counts the number of cargoship objects in a file and initializes array
      Parameters:
      initialCargo - original file
      Returns:
      number of cargoships in file
      Throws:

    • fixInventory

      private static void fixInventory​(String initialCargo, String newCargo) throws IOException
      extract cargos into array, write corrected serial numbers into new file
      Parameters:
      count - length of array / nb of cargo objs
      initialCargo - file name we are reading from
      newCargo - file name we are writing to
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      IOException - if cannot read from file
